venue.name: Rowe's Wharf Sea Grille: AT THE BOSTON HARBOR HOTEL

item.description:
Take in beautiful views of the harbor while enjoying an cup of hot tea.  "Start off your journey  with two selections of warmed scones; Macadamia Currant and Lemon Poppy Seed. Pick from various pastry breads served with Clotted Devonshire Cream, Fresh Berries and Cookies.

Next, savor our assortment of finger sandwiches featuring Maple Smoked Salmon and Melted Fennel Cream, Smoked Turkey, Parmesan, Basil and Tomato, Shrimp Lime and Avocado, and Egg Salad Duet.

To finish your tea, indulge in our compilation of enticing French Pastries. Including; Chocolate Boston Cream Profiteroles and Assorted Fruit Tartlettes."

The Tea menu includes organic tea selections; whites, green teas, as well as black and blended teas.

The Afternoon Tea starts at around $20 plus tip.  You can also enjoy Sparkling Wine or Pink Champagne at an additional cost.  Here is a link for the tea: http://www.roweswharfseagrille.com/menu.html#

Seating is limited for this event.  Please only RSVP if you know you will be attending and update your RSVP if your plans change. Thanks.
item.how_to_find_us: The reservation is under my name, "Noelle."

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Afternoon Tea at Boston Harbor Hotel
